review_text: This blender sucks! It does not work!  Everything just sits there and I have to use a spoon every few seconds to mix it up.  DO NOT BUY THIS BLENDER! It will save you time and a headache you if buy a different one.
product_name: Cuisinart SPB-7 SmartPower 40-Ounce 7-Speed Electronic Bar Blender, White DISCONTINUED BY MANUFACTURER
